posts.post_content:
Greetings everyone, does the 1895 N300 Ed Delehanty come up for sale often? Seems to be a tough card to locate.
Thanks,
Richard
I've seen about 4 this previous year.  REA, Bussineau off hand

One just sold today on EBay.. And that seller, Don's Cards had posted one, maybe even two for sale on BST in the past year+.  But am guessing they don't come up very often.

ADDING...Nevermind, sounds like they do come up quite a bit

There is a BVG "4" of that card for sale in the upcoming Huggins and Scott auction. A "good" version of the card sold for $2,000 in the Clean Sweep auction about six weeks ago.

[url]http://www.hugginsandscott.com/cgi-bin/showitem.pl?itemid=59120[/url]
